list.body: Move with Lil to the black mountain hills of Dakota
Get hit in the eye by Danny
Check into room, read Gideon's bible
Overhear Lil and Danny in neighboring room
Burst into neighboring room, declaring showdown
Get shot by Danny and collapse in corner
Return to room, read Gideon's bible
Sing along! "D'do d'do d'do do do d'do d'do d'do"
Take your kid to soccer class
